summary: Agro Crops ‚Äì Organic Farming Management System: A modern, responsive, green-themed multi-page website for organic farming. Includes Signup, OTP Verification, Home, About, Produce/Techniques, Farm, Shop, Cattle, Equipment, and Contact pages. Features add-to-cart, wishlist, search, location-based crop suggestions, government schemes info, smooth animations, and a future scope section.
architectural_notes: Green-themed design: primary green, secondary white/light brown, soft gradients, rounded cards, light shadows
Animations: fadeIn, zoomIn, slideUp used throughout all pages
Mobile-responsive layout required across all pages
Multi-page website structure (10 pages) with consistent header/navbar
known_issues: Cart add-to-cart functionality is not working on the Shop page
Signup page is accessible even after authentication (should redirect authenticated users away from /signup)
Signup page/option not visible on the website ‚Äî navigation or routing to /signup may be broken

existing_features.title: Implement a green, eco-friendly visual theme throughout the entire application: primary color green (#2d6a4f / #52b788 range), secondary colors white and light brown (#d4a373), soft gradients on headers and cards, rounded card corners (border-radius ~12‚Äì16px), light drop shadows, clean sans-serif typography, and a nature/farming aesthetic. Apply CSS keyframe animations for fadeIn, zoomIn, and slideUp that trigger on page load and scroll entry for all major sections.

Create a Signup page with a mobile number input field (10-digit numeric validation with real-time error feedback), a Sign Up button that is disabled until a valid 10-digit number is entered, and navigation to the OTP Verification page on submission. Store the entered mobile number in React state for passing to the OTP page.

Create an OTP Verification page with 4 separate single-digit input boxes. Implement auto-focus advance: when a digit is entered, focus moves automatically to the next box; backspace on an empty box moves focus to the previous box. On submission validate that all 4 boxes are filled and if correct navigate to the Home page. Show an error message for incorrect OTP. Use a hardcoded demo OTP (e.g., '1234') for validation since no backend SMS service is available.

Create a Home page with: a sticky header containing the Agro Crops logo (leaf icon) and slogan 'Organic Farming'; a navigation bar with links to Home, About, Produce, Techniques, Contact, and Categories; a full-width hero section featuring the generated hero background image with overlay text promoting organic farming; an introduction section highlighting the benefits of organic farming (healthier food, environmental sustainability, soil health); a Location-Based Crop Suggestions section (static UI with a region selector and suggested crops list); a Government Schemes information section (static cards listing 3‚Äì4 scheme names and brief descriptions); and a Future Scope section describing IoT-based smart farming, AI chatbot for farmers in local languages, blockchain for supply chain transparency, community knowledge sharing platform, and B2B & B2C marketplace expansion. Apply fadeIn and slideUp animations to all sections.

Create an About page with a green gradient header section titled 'About Agro Crops', a Mission card and a Vision card (animated with zoomIn), and a clean professional layout describing the platform's goals of promoting organic farming, supporting farmers, and enabling sustainable agriculture.

Create a Produce/Techniques page with three animated informational cards covering: Composting (‚ôªÔ∏è), Pest Control (üêõ), and Crop Rotation (üîÑ). Create a Farm page with an introduction section on organic farming principles, a search box that filters a static list of crops (wheat, rice, maize, sugarcane, cotton, tomato, potato) by name with real-time filtering, displaying matching crop cards with a crop name, emoji, and brief growing guidance. Create a Shop page with a responsive product grid (3 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile). Each product card includes a product image (from generated assets), name, price in INR, an 'Add to Cart' button, and a wishlist heart icon toggle. Implement a global cart state (React Context or useState) tracking cart items and quantities. Implement a wishlist state tracking wishlisted items. Show a cart item count badge in the header. Include at least 9 products across categories: organic seeds, vegetables, and fertilizers.

Create a Cattle page with a search box for filtering animals by name, a grid of animal cards (cow, buffalo, goat, sheep, poultry) each showing an animal image (from generated assets), animal name, food & care information summary, and a 'View More' button that expands/reveals detailed care info. Include a 'Benefits of Organic Cattle Rearing' section below the grid with icon-bullet points.

Create an Equipment page with a search box that filters farm tools by name, a responsive grid displaying cards for: Tractor, Plough, Thresher, and Sprayer. Each card includes a generated tool image, tool name, and a short description of its use. Apply scroll-triggered slideUp animations to cards as they enter the viewport.

Create a Contact page with a motivational headline ('Growing Together for a Greener Tomorrow'), a contact info section displaying a demo email and phone number, and a simple contact form with fields for Name, Email, Message, and a Submit button. Apply a slideUp animation to the form on page load. Show a success message after form submission (no backend required ‚Äî simulate with state).
